title: Meta to acquire startup Manus, adding agents to bolster AI bet

title: How Robo-Advisors Are Changing Everyday Investing
description: Key Takeaways Robo-advisors are democratizing investment management by offering low-cost, automated services accessible to a broader audience. These platforms provide benefits such as reduced fees, enhanced transparency, and customized investment strategies. While robo-advisors offer numerous advantages, they also present challenges, including limited personalization and potential algorithmic biases. The integration of artificial intelligence is further enhancing […]

title: Why Mark Zuckerberg’s Meta is buying Manus AI: What the startup does and why it matters
description: Meta has announced plans to acquire Manus AI, a China-based artificial intelligence startup, aiming to accelerate the rollout of advanced AI features across its platforms.
content: Meta has outlined its intention to acquire Manus AI, a China-based artificial intelligence startup, as part of its strategy to speed up the rollout of next-generation AI capabilities across its platforms. The deal is expected to strengthen Meta’s AI ... [2147 chars]

title: 2026 predictions: 7 Baba Vanga forecast that could change the world we know - AI warning, economic crisis, natural disasters, World War 3
description: As 2026 approaches, interest in the predictions of Bulgarian mystic Baba Vanga has resurfaced. Followers and several reports link her forecasts to major global events, including a possible World War 3, severe natural disasters, economic instability, and rapid advances in artificial intelligence. Some interpretations also suggest first contact with extraterrestrial life and shifts in global power toward Asia.
content:

title: AI Could Be the 'End of Human Actors' in Hollywood
description: Oscar-nominated actor James Woods is warning artificial intelligence (AI) is not a short-lived craze, but a technology that could mean the "end of human actors" in Hollywood.
content:
Oscar-nominated actor James Woods is warning artificial intelligence (AI) is not a short-lived craze, but a technology that could mean the “end of human actors” in Hollywood.

title: AI will play even bigger role for recruiters during 2026, says expert
